mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO EMP (EMP_SQ, PMS_SQ, DPT_SQ, RNK_SQ, PST_SQ, EMP_NM, EMP_ID, EMP_PW, EMP_SEX, EMP_BDATE , EMP_ML_ID, EMP_ML_ADDR, EMP_TEL1, EMP_TEL2, EMP_TEL3, EMP_ZIP, EMP_ADDR, EMP_ADDR_DT , EMP_BS_TEL1,EMP_BS_TEL2, EMP_BS_TEL3, EMP_CRT, EMP_REG, EMP_EXIT, EMP_FNL_MOD) VALUES (#{emp_sq}, #{pms_sq}, #{dpt_sq}, #{rnk_sq}, #{pst_sq}, #{emp_nm}, #{emp_id}, #{emp_pw} , #{emp_sex}, #{emp_bdate}, #{emp_ml_id}, #{emp_ml_addr}, #{emp_tel1}, #{emp_tel2}, #{emp_tel3}, #{emp_zip}, #{emp_addr}, #{emp_addr_dt} , #{emp_bs_tel1}, #{emp_bs_tel2}, #{emp_bs_tel3}, #{emp_crt}, sysdate, '', sysdate) INTO EMP_PIC (EMP_SQ, EMP_PIC_DT, EMP_PIC_RT, EMP_PIC_ONM, EMP_PIC_MNM) VALUES (#{emp_sq}, #{emp_pic_dt}, #{emp_pic_rt}, #{emp_pic_onm}, #{emp_pic_mnm}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET DPT_SQ = #{dpt_sq}, RNK_SQ = #{rnk_sq}, PST_SQ = #{pst_sq}, EMP_BS_TEL1 = #{emp_bs_tel1}, EMP_BS_TEL2 = #{emp_bs_tel2}, EMP_BS_TEL3 = #{emp_bs_tel3}, EMP_EXIT = nvl(#{emp_exit}, '5000-10-10') WHERE EMP_SQ = #{emp_sq}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DPT.DPT_SQ, DPT_NM FROM DPT, EMP WHERE DPT.DPT_SQ = EMP.DPT_SQ
SELECT DISTINCT PMS.PMS_SQ, PMS_NM FROM PMS, EMP WHERE PMS.PMS_SQ = EMP.PMS_SQ AND EMP.PMS_SQ = #{pms_sq}
SELECT DISTINCT DPT.DPT_SQ, DPT_NM FROM DPT, EMP WHERE DPT.DPT_SQ = EMP.DPT_SQ AND EMP.DPT_SQ = #{dpt_sq}
SELECT PST.PST_SQ, PST_NM FROM PST, EMP WHERE PST.PST_SQ = EMP.PST_SQ
SELECT DISTINCT PST.PST_SQ, PST_NM FROM PST, EMP WHERE PST.PST_SQ = EMP.PST_SQ AND EMP.PST_SQ = #{pst_sq}
SELECT RNK.RNK_SQ, RNK_NM FROM RNK, EMP WHERE RNK.RNK_SQ = EMP.RNK_SQ
SELECT DISTINCT RNK.RNK_SQ, RNK_NM FROM RNK, EMP WHERE RNK.RNK_SQ = EMP.RNK_SQ AND EMP.RNK_SQ = #{rnk_sq}
